message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you thinking of me.  I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now.  How about $95?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $105?
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $105 is still a bit more than I'd like to spend right now.  How about we split the difference and settle on $100?
